page.title: 16TOTAL OIL.
page.content: Total is a{worldwide firm.}When the tanker comes carrying oil mainly from the North sea,Saudi Arabia and Mexico it takes 30 hours for the boat to get to Guernsey and{6 hours to unload. They turn on some big flow pipes which run under the road into tanks which can take seven and a half million litres.When the lorries need some oil first the man puts a ticket in the meter,then he pushes a few buttons to see how much oil he needs.Next he pulls a lever and the oil starts to flow into the tanks.It takes 7 minutes to load 7000 litres.People use the oil for{central heating, heating for {greenhouses and diesel for lorries. Total exports oil to the other Channel Islands.
